info.title: SMMRY
info.description: SMMRY is an automatic summary generator.  SMMRY is accessible by an API. Developers are able to implement SMMRY into applications that may require a summary of a webpage or variable. Developers need to generate an API key to access this feature.

parameters.name: SM_LENGTH
parameters.description: number of sentences returned, default is 7

parameters.name: SM_WITH_BREAK
parameters.description: summary will contain string [BREAK] between each sentence
